sections.title: Data collection from you
sections.summary: This study will ask you to provide the information about the following categories:

data_types.data_information: You have to input some info about alcohol in the alcohol card  Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aliquam ut aliquet augue, sed maximus sapien. You have to input some info about your mood in the mood card
You have to input some info about your weight in the weight card
You have to input some info about your medications in the medications card
You have to input some info about your smoking in the smoking card

sections.title: Passive data collection
sections.summary: This study will passively collect data about the following categories:

data_types.data_information: Your daily step counts as collected by the phone.
Your different types of activities as detected by the phone
Your location as you move around
Background noise as detected by the phone's microphone
